results.title: Metformin reduces saturated fatty acid-induced lipid accumulation and inflammatory response by restoration of autophagic flux in endothelial cells
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ reduces @<m>DISEASE_Pneumonia_Lipid</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011017 @@@LD@@@ by enhancing the degradation of @<m>DISEASE_Pneumonia_Lipid</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011017 @@@LD@@@, but not by inhibiting the formation of @<m>DISEASE_Pneumonia_Lipid</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011017 @@@LD@@@

results.title: Metformin Alleviates Liver Metabolic Dysfunction in Polycystic Ovary Syndrome by Activating the Ethe1/Keap1/PINK1 Pathway.
results.text_hl: Results: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ effectively alleviated @<m>DISEASE_Pneumonia_Lipid</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011017 @@@hepatic lipid accumulation@@@ in the @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

results.title: Progenies of gestational diabetes mellitus exhibit sex disparity in metabolism after respective therapies of insulin, glibenclamide, and metformin in dams during pregnancy.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: The dyslipidaemia, @<m>DISEASE_Pneumonia_Lipid</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011017 @@@hepatic lipid abnormality@@@, and @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@insulin insensitivity@@@ caused by @DISEASE_Diabetes_Gestational @DISEASE_MESH:D016640 @@@GDM@@@ were persistently normalised in male adult offspring by the respective therapies of insulin, @CHEMICAL_Glyburide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005905 @@@glibenclamide@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ during maternal pregnancy.

citations.NLM: Lu Y, Jia Y, Lu J, Liu J, Xu Y, Liu Y, Chen K. Progenies of gestational diabetes mellitus exhibit sex disparity in metabolism after respective therapies of insulin, glibenclamide, and metformin in dams during pregnancy. Arch Physiol Biochem. 2021 Oct 23;():1-13. PMID: 34689672

results.title: Lipid Accumulation in Hearts Transplanted From Nondiabetic Donors to Diabetic Recipients.
results.text_hl: We evaluated cardiomyocyte morpho-pathology by seriated biopsies of healthy implanted hearts in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@DM@@@ recipients during 12-month follow-up from @DISEASE_605376 @DISEASE_OMIM:605376 @@@HTX@@@. Because @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ reduces @<m>DISEASE_Pneumonia_Lipid</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011017 @@@ectopic lipid accumulation@@@, we evaluated the effects of the drug in a nonrandomized subgroup.

results.title: Influence of the use of atypical antipsychotics in metabolic syndrome
results.text_hl: There is a relationship between the use of atypical antipsychotics and @DISEASE_Weight_Gain @DISEASE_MESH:D015430 @@@weight gain@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Pneumonia_Lipid</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011017 @@@lipid disorders@@@, @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@ and high blood pressure.

results.title: Metformin: the hidden chronicles of a magic drug.
results.text_hl: Data has been conclusive that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ also has beneficial role in @<m>DISEASE_Pneumonia_Lipid</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011017 @@@lipid disorders@@@ as it improves the markers of @DISEASE_Metabolic_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D024821 @@@metabolic syndrome@@@.

results.title: Role of metformin in treatment of diabetes mellitus.
results.text_hl: In addition to its antidiabetic actions, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ causes @DISEASE_Weight_Loss @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@weight loss@@@ in @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obese@@@ @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ and may be useful in managing associated @<m>DISEASE_Pneumonia_Lipid</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011017 @@@lipid disorders@@@.

citations.NLM: Vigneri R, Goldfine ID. Role of metformin in treatment of diabetes mellitus. Diabetes Care. 1987 Jan-Feb;10(1):118-22. PMID: 3552509

results.title: Interaction between metformin and leucine in reducing hyperlipidemia and hepatic lipid accumulation in diet-induced obese mice.
results.text_hl: Interaction between @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Leucine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007930 @@@leucine@@@ in reducing @DISEASE_Hyperlipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D006949 @@@hyperlipidemia@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Pneumonia_Lipid</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011017 @@@hepatic lipid accumulation@@@ in diet-induced @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obese@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

results.title: The European Exenatide study of long-term exenatide vs. glimepiride for type 2 diabetes: rationale and patient characteristics.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ included in the EUREXA study had early failure of @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@ control with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and presented typical features of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@: @DISEASE_Overweight @DISEASE_MESH:D050177 @@@overweight@@@/@DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obesity@@@ and high prevalence of @<m>DISEASE_Pneumonia_Lipid</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011017 @@@lipid abnormalities@@@ and @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@CVD@@@.

results.title: Metformin and intervention in polycystic ovary syndrome. Endocrine Society of Australia, the Australian Diabetes Society and the Australian Paediatric Endocrine Group.
results.text_hl: The effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Pneumonia_Lipid</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011017 @@@lipid abnormalities@@@, @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ or premature @DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@vascular disease@@@ are unknown, but the relative safety, moderate cost, and efficacy in reducing @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@insulin resistance@@@ suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may prove to be of benefit in combating these components of the "@DISEASE_Metabolic_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D024821 @@@metabolic" syndrome@@@ in @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@.
